column4: I am trying to play a DVD... totem says "does not have the appropriate plugins to be able to read the disk"  I can cd to the drive and "ls" fine... what do I need to apt-get?
libdvdnav: DVD disk reports itself with Region mask 0x00fe0000. Regions: 1
[00000455] a52 decoder: A/52 channels:6 samplerate:48000 bitrate:448000
